cause.description:
This is an organization that supports Jewish life at Amherst College by providing additional funding for Jewish programming at these campuses. Director-Rabbi Bruce Bromberg Seltzer, Amherst College Jewish Religious Advisor bbseltzer@amherst.edu 413 585 2755
1. Universally Human, Distinctively Jewish - All Amherst
cause.mission: Promote Jewish Life at Amherst Colleges
cause.name: Amherst Hillel
